mapper.select: SELECT a.title ,b.board_file_no ,b.file_name FROM brd_free a, brd_free_file b WHERE a.board_no = b.board_no AND a.board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY b.board_file_no

SELECT a.board_no , a.user_no , b.user_name user_nm , a.title , a.contents , a.reg_ip , a.reg_date , DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_date_fmt , a.view_cnt , (select count(board_file_no) from brd_free_file where board_no = a.board_no) file_cnt , (select count(memo_no) from brd_free_memo where fk_no = a.board_no) memo_cnt , (select MAX(board_file_no) from brd_free_file where board_no = a.board_no) board_file_no , FLOOR((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) - a.reg_date) / 24 / 60 / 60) day_cnt FROM brd_free a, top_mbr_bsc b WHERE a.user_no = b.user_no
AND a.title like '%${boardSrcWord}%'
AND (a.title like '%${boardSrcWord}%' OR a.contents like '%${boardSrcWord}%')
AND b.user_name like '%${boardSrcWord}%'
ORDER BY a.board_no DESC LIMIT #{queryPgNoInt}, 15

SELECT count(a.board_no) cnt FROM brd_free a, top_mbr_bsc b WHERE a.user_no = b.user_no
AND a.title like '%${boardSrcWord}%'
AND (a.title like '%${boardSrcWord}%' OR a.contents like '%${boardSrcWord}%')
AND b.user_name like '%${boardSrcWord}%'

SELECT board_no, user_no, getTopMbrBscUserName(user_no) user_nm, title, contents, reg_ip , reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_date_fmt, view_cnt FROM brd_free WHERE board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY board_no DESC

SELECT board_file_no,board_no,file_path,file_name , reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_date_fmt , CONCAT(file_path, file_name) encodedFilePathName FROM brd_free_file WHERE board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY board_file_no
mapper.update: UPDATE brd_free SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
UPDATE brd_free SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents} WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
UPDATE brd_free SET contents = REPLACE(contents,#{oldStr},#{newStr}) WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
